definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
lit. to go to war without just cause (idiom)/to act without justification

sentences.english: Niki's voice provoked a new bout of unreasoning anger.
sentences.chinese: 妮基一開口又激起了無名的怒火。

sentences.english: But supervisors are stopping short of slamming on the brakes.
sentences.chinese: 但是監管者此舉師出無名。

sentences.english: The sun rose and smiled on it.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇上來了，向無名花微笑。

sentences.english: They are the unsung heroes of the Chinese economic miracle.
sentences.chinese: 他們是中國經濟奇蹟的無名英雄。

sentences.english: Due to the lack of legitimacy, the justice of the war is prevalently challenged.
sentences.chinese: 由於師出無名，這場戰爭始終存在着合法性危機。

sentences.english: Malbec really is one of the relatively unknown gems of the Chilean climate.
sentences.chinese: 馬貝克稱得上是智利無名的寶石。

sentences.english: I had expected the ring finger of the love, but it is the feeling or debt.
sentences.chinese: 我曾期望無名指的愛，卻不知它是情還是債。

sentences.english: When I started in politics I was just an ordinary kind of guy.
sentences.chinese: 我開始從政時，還是個無名之輩。

sentences.english: Li Wei makes person unknown in daily life as an eternal monument to sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 黎薇是將日常生活中的無名者作爲永恆的豐碑來雕刻。

sentences.english: If you're not on the list, go to the East Side and go to a bar there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你榜上無名，就請去東城區的酒吧。

sentences.english: To the point in the ring finger.
In 1999, when he assumed the role of acting President, he was a relative unknown.
sentences.chinese: 1999年他擔任代理總統時，還是無名之輩。

sentences.english: The unsung hero of this campaign.
sentences.chinese: 這次競選中的無名英雄。

sentences.english: This meant the wing did not have a ring finger.
sentences.chinese: 這揭示了爲什麼翼部沒有長出無名指。

sentences.english: Having a long ring finger confers a host of other benefits.
sentences.chinese: 擁有纖長的無名指被授予許多好處。

definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
